import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
%matplotlib inline
source.6b2dcbf4:
df.sex = df.sex.fillna('male')
df.body_mass_g = df.body_mass_g.fillna(df.body_mass_g.mean())
df.flipper_length_mm = df.flipper_length_mm.fillna(df.flipper_length_mm.mean())
df.bill_depth_mm = df.bill_depth_mm.fillna(df.bill_depth_mm.mean())
df.bill_length_mm = df.bill_length_mm.fillna(df.bill_length_mm.mean())
source.3375ba93: sns.heatmap(df.corr(), annot=True, linewidths=0.5, vmin=-1, vmax=1, cmap="YlGnBu")
source.3201b317: sns.pairplot(df.drop('year', axis=1), diag_kind="hist", hue='species', markers=["o", "s", "D"], palette='deep')
source.988a737e:
g = sns.PairGrid(df.drop('year', axis=1), hue='species', diag_sharey=False)
g.map_upper(sns.scatterplot, style=df['sex'])
g.map_lower(sns.kdeplot)
g.map_diag(sns.kdeplot, fill=True)
g.add_legend(title='')
source.dbfdddad: sns.catplot(data=df, x='species', col='island', row='year', kind='count', hue='sex', height=3.5)
source.d69a4910: sns.displot(data=df, x='bill_length_mm', hue='species', kde=True, col='sex', multiple="stack", palette='deep')
source.41a026cf: sns.displot(data=df, x='bill_length_mm', y='bill_depth_mm', hue='species', kind='kde', palette='deep', rug=True)
source.867a88b5: sns.scatterplot(data=df, x='bill_length_mm', y='body_mass_g', hue='species', style='sex', size='island', palette='deep')
source.128c3735: sns.violinplot(data=df, x='species', y='body_mass_g', hue='sex', split=True, inner='quart', palette='deep')
source.84cf7909: sns.jointplot(data=df, x='flipper_length_mm', y='body_mass_g', hue='species', kind='kde', palette='deep')
source.e180f5dd: sns.jointplot(data=df, x='flipper_length_mm', y='body_mass_g', hue='species', kind='hist', palette='deep')
source.8b4d3958:
g = sns.FacetGrid(df, col="species", row="sex", height=4.5, aspect=1.2)
g.map_dataframe(sns.histplot, x="body_mass_g", hue='year', kde=True, palette='deep')
